input.sentences: [male] and his friends spent the day in country .
[male] found a headstone with his name on it .
the ocean was calm and peaceful
output.sentences: Recently, I took a road trip with some of my friends.
Along the way, we found a military cemetery so we decided to stop.
We found some very interesting headstones, and we ended up spending a while there.
We stayed long enough to watch the sunset, which was beautiful shades of pink and purple.
We decided to go down to the shore to enjoy the sounds of the ocean.
